torblock-blocked:
Used as error message. Parameters:
* $1 - IP address
torblock-isexitnode:
Used as the tor blocking status message. Parameters:
* $1 - IP address
right-torunblocked:
{{doc-right|torunblocked}}

Users with this right are not affected by automatic blocking by [[mw:Extension:TorBlock|Extension:TorBlock]] (and can therefore edit using tor).
tag-tor-description: Description of tag that appears e.g. in [[Special:Tags]]
tag-tor: Shown on lists of changes (history, recentchanges, etc.) for each edit made through tor
abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-tor-exit-n: Abuse filter syntax option in a dropdown from the group {{msg-mw|Abusefilter-edit-builder-group-vars}}. ($1 is the text that will be inserted into the filter code editor.)
